title: Course-to-Routine Builder
desc: Compare between sections of courses in real-time with your current selection.

title: CGPA Calculator
desc: Upload your Connect gradesheet PDF and recalculate previous semester results or predict future CGPA based on your estimations of upcoming courses. Watch the GPAs auto-update in real-time!

title: Class Vader
desc: Find classrooms and labs that are currently being used or unused.

title: Academic/ APA-7 Document Editor
desc: Easily create documents for your assignments in APA-7 format. Includes data persistence on your device (so everything stays there, until you delete/edit it yourself.)

title: Online CV Builder
desc: Create, update and export your CV from anywhere. Includes data persistence on your device (so everything stays there, until you delete/edit it yourself.)

title: Course Lookup Assistant (v2)
desc: Dynamic course selection and routine builder for BRAC University.
